Description: We pursue a healthy fandom culture where artists and fans grow and communicate together.
Information collected for events will be destroyed immediately after prize delivery.
Please prepare personal items (umbrella, heat packs, etc.) for outdoor waiting in case of weather changes.
Check the ticket booking page for availability of storage lockers at the venue.
Dangerous items such as glass bottles, fireworks, and lasers are prohibited inside the venue.
Transferred tickets that cannot be verified will be denied entry and are non-refundable.
Please complete entry at least 30 minutes before the show starts for a smooth experience.
Goods distribution near the venue is only allowed in designated areas to avoid blocking traffic.
Cheering tools of other artists or non-standard slogans are restricted, except for official lightsticks.
All photography, video recording, and audio recording are prohibited to protect copyrights.
The official shop supports domestic/international cards, simple payments, and PayPal.
Official goods can be purchased through the [Shop Name] mobile app.
During comeback periods, shipping may be delayed by 1-2 weeks due to high order volume.
If items are damaged, please contact us within 7 days of receipt with an unboxing video.
Always check the actual photos and component list on the MD detail page before purchasing.
Pre-order items are made-to-order, so cancellations may be difficult after payment.
Comeback celebration pop-up stores may operate on a pre-reservation basis.
Please sync (map) your seat number with the lightstick via the official app before the show.
Restocking of sold-out items will be announced via official Twitter once confirmed.
Please contact the platform's customer center for fan community app connection issues.
Donation support made in the artist's name is encouraged and official certification is supported.
Food and gift support can only proceed after prior email approval from the agency.
Perishable food items or luxury high-end gifts may be rejected.
We do not provide individual confirmation regarding the receipt of support items.
Meeting times must be coordinated with the agency's security team before vendor visits.
Detailed financial records must be transparently shared within the fan union community after support.
Installation of wreaths at concert venues may be restricted by venue regulations.
Artist broadcasts, events, and performance schedules are available on the official website calendar.
Surprise live broadcasts will be notified via community app push notifications.
Check the 'Music Show Notice' on the official community the day before for participation details.
Visiting private spaces or non-public schedules is strictly prohibited and results in ban.
Participation in pre-recordings or post-recordings is limited to pre-confirmed individuals.
All schedules are displayed in Korea Standard Time (KST, UTC+9).
Schedule changes or cancellations due to health reasons will be announced immediately via SNS.
Important notices are sent in real-time via Telegram or official app alerts.
Multilingual auto-responses are supported for major questions for global fans.
Direct agent connection hours are weekdays 11:00-16:00.
Please understand that responses may be delayed during comeback periods due to high volume.
This bot is for information only and does not support direct conversation with the artist.
Questions infringing on the artist's privacy during live broadcasts will be filtered and blocked.
Email [protect@agency.com] to report infringement of rights or spreading of false rumors.
Stalking artist's dorms or vehicles is subject to legal action.
Legal action against malicious comments will be taken strictly without leniency.
Please refrain from close-up photography at the airport to ensure safety.
Sharing hotel or restaurant info during tours is prohibited for artist safety.
Please follow the instructions of on-site security to ensure the artist's movement path.
Please send proposals for advertisements or collaborations to [biz@agency.com].
Check the [Audition] tab for instructions on how to apply as a trainee.
When reporting rights infringement, use the format: [Date/Platform/Content/URL].
Winners can be checked via individual contact or the official notice board.
First-come, first-served events follow the sequence of the distributed number tags.
Some events require parental consent for participants under the age of 14.
Wait in a stable network environment; calls will end if another person is present.
A group photo taken with the artist after the event will be uploaded.
Lightsticks, albums, and IDs are often mandatory for participating in on-site events.
Conducted via lottery for album buyers; only the winner may participate.
Global tour and event info is provided in multiple languages via global notices.
The current list of affiliated artists is available under the [Artist] menu on the website.
The office is at OO Building, OO-dong; internal tours are not allowed.
Membership-exclusive photos are updated on the 1st of every month.
Unreleased photocards are randomly included in each album.
Behind-the-scenes videos on the official YouTube are uploaded Fridays at 6 PM.
Please refer to the fan union guidelines for music and music video streaming.
English, Japanese, and Chinese subtitles are provided for all official videos.
Unauthorized capture or sharing of paid content may result in legal penalties.
Schedules for Season's Greetings and photobook pre-orders are announced in the second half.
Scalping or using macros will result in ticket cancellation and blacklisting.
Pre-sales are available for verified membership members before general sales.
Wheelchair seats can only be booked via phone through the ticketing customer center.
Standard envelopes are recommended; parcel-type letters may be rejected.
Letters can only be sent via mail or designated drop-boxes at official events.
Paid memberships can be joined through official fan communities (Weverse, Bubble, etc.).
Renewal is possible within 30 days before/after membership expiration.
Nicknames using artist names or profanity will be restricted.
Benefits include pre-sale rights, exclusive content access, and kit purchase eligibility.
Update your latest address in My Page before the membership kit shipping starts.
Membership kits are shipped quarterly and may take time to receive.
Membership rights cannot be sold or transferred to others.
Mobile membership cards can be viewed in the My Page section of the community app.
Birthday ads and electronic billboard support can proceed if agency guidelines are met.
